schema:name: Drew Carriage Company Photograph Album
schema:description:
This promotional photo album produced by the Drew Carriage Company contains thirteen silver gelatin photographs. The images include the front of the Ontario, California dealership with a Model T parked out front, followed by views of the showroom's ornate tin ceiling, and advertisements for a variety of products, including Oliver plows and harrows and Keen Kutter knives and cutlery. Most of the photographs show the engine and operation of the newly introduced kerosene-powered International Harvester 8-16 Tractor. The images also show the tractor harrowing orchard groves and fields and a final image of the company's founder, Frederick A.C. Drew, with his wife and company officials and friends.o

The collection's finding aid is available at the Online Archive of California (forthcoming).
schema:creator: Carriage, Drew
